1. The Account is now Active and will appear for selection in Service, as long as the relevant ‘Referring Status’ has been selected
  2. Ensure relevant fields are maintained to keep the Account Information up to date and relevant
1. The Account is now Closed and therefore is no longer an active relationship

1. Tasks can be added to the Onboarding case to support any setup requirements with other areas of the business i.e. reporting, Glassline etc
  2. Once you are happy that all the necessary Onboarding Tasks have been completed and all the Account Rules have been added, the account can be moved to Active
  3. Make sure the relevant ‘Referring Status’ option on the Account record has been selected, as this drives visibility of the Referral Accounts in Service

1. As Referral accounts are not used for billing jobs, a credit check is not required
  2. Set up required Account Rules ahead of Onboarding
  3. Referral accounts will be associated to applicable jobs during the job booking process

1. Capture as much information as possible about the potential volume of jobs and the mix of underwriters (for Brokers)
  2. Record information about any current VGRRR relationships and their share of work
  3. Make sure to log a 'Next Communication Date' when there is not an associated Opportunity, so that you are automatically reminded of when next to make contact
1. The account has been placed on hold, please reach out to Account Maintenance for further information
